item.title: Finger dislocator: creating negative feelings in VR
item.description: Persuasive Design Pulling vs Pushing An idea of “push” Why finger ? Sensitive + easy to do + used by many haptic devices Prototype Visual only Overriding the Quest finger tracking Adding haptics Prototype Box + 3D print servo + Arduino Synchronization Uduino for time sync (photo setup) Use of controllers for spatial sync The danger of realism cf paper Perspectives Improving realism Solenoid Add simulation of impact at the moment of dislocation
